name: com.vaflov.so-architecture
description:
Scriptable Object (SO) Architecture provides scriptable object-based events, event listeners, constants and enums.
The project is based on Ryan Hipple's talk at Unite Austin 2017 https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=raQ3iHhE_Kk and borrows from SolidAlloy's projects  and borrows from SolidAlloy's projects https://github.com/SolidAlloy.

samples.displayName: UI binding and sets as tags
samples.description: The sample shows how to use events and event listeners for binding a healthbar to the health of the player and enemies. It also shows how to use runtime sets as tags - as in each object can have an arbitrary number of tags instead of just 1 like the built-in unity tag system.
samples.path: Samples~/UI binding and sets as tags

samples.description: The sample shows how to set up a data-driven achievements system with game event listeners.
